alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Koolau Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 16 at 3:41PM HST until November 17 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND MAUI... .The current northwest swell is transitioning to a more northerly direction (340 to 350 degrees) and will maintain advisory level surf along north facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai, and Maui through tonight. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST THURSDAY... * WHAT...North facing shores surf 12 to 16 feet. * WHERE...Niihau, Oahu North Shore, Olomana, Maui Windward West, Kauai North, Koolau Windward, Molokai Windward, Molokai North, Maui Central Valley North and Windward Haleakala. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Kauai North; Koolau Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Windward Haleakala
